Stream Engine¶

class pybart.streamengine.StreamEngine(zmq_trig_enable, simulated=False, parent=None, **option)¶

This object emit epoch in real time from a EEG device using BrainVision Recorder.

configuration(low_fequency, high_frequency, trig_params)¶

Create, configure and plug all pyacq node

Low_fequency

set low frequency of the pass band

High_frequency

set high frequency of the pass band

Trig_params

triggers parameter on a dict format

set_slot_new_epochs(slot_on_new_chunk)¶

This function set the output slot for each epoch stack

start_nodes()¶

Start all nodes

stop_nodes()¶

Stop all nodes and close all widget nodes
